ygData.msgSnippet: This might be interesting also. http://pub142.ezboard.com/fayonaerofrm1.showMessage?topicID=4302.topic ... From: ACDurston [mailto:adurston3@comcast.net] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
This might be interesting also.

http://pub142.ezboard.com/fayonaerofrm1.showMessage?topicID=4302.topic


-----Original Message-----
From: ACDurston [mailto:adurston3@...]
Sent: den 9 april 2003 20:49
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Giant Lag Spikes....


Hey all,

(Am tired of the "post all your Dxdiag info here and we'll not comment back
to you..." so I thought I would post here.)

I have a P4 1.4, 656 Meg memory, 64 Mb GeoForce 2 card w latest drivers.
Sometimes, when just sitting about, my lag goes to 90% and sits there.
Sometimes I go LD and sometimes I recover. Have seen it happen on a variety
of zones.

Am on a cable modem via linksys router but it doesn't happen to my wife (on
another port/machine). I dont have any other processes running (only
Explorer, killed the rest) and 20 Gb disk free.

Thoughts?

Andrew

ps Am going to do the data rate fix.
